law.catch_line: Collection and disposition of fines imposed.
law.text: All fines imposed under KRS 6.050 or 6.070 shall be collected by the sheriff of the county where the offender or his estate is found, under the mandate of the house imposing the fine, signed by its presiding officer and shall be paid into the State Treasury by the sheriff, and accounted for as other public moneys collected by him.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1984.
